articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA Unit 531
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by Art Squad of KPA Unit 531
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un together with service persons of the KPA enjoyed the performance given by the art squad of KPA Unit 531.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as narration and chorus "Strength of Korea", agitation drama "Let Us Reap Richer Bean Harvest ", dramatic witticism "Let Us Glorify the Name of the People's Army", poem and story-telling "There Is South Sea before Us" and chorus "All Servicepersons and People Will Become Human Bullets and Bombs". 
					
					 Through the performance the artistes sang high praises of the unchangeable mode of the KPA counteraction to counter the enemies coming in attack with a dagger with a sword, a rifle with an artillery piece and nukes with precision nuclear strike means of Korean style more powerful than them.
					
					 Watching the performance, the audience pledged themselves to deal deadly blows at the enemies and victoriously conclude the great war for national reunification once an order is issued by the Supreme Commander.
					
					 He was greatly satisfied with the fact that the artistes of the art squad of KPA Unit 531 staged a splendid performance reflecting the noble ideological and moral traits and militant mettle of the KPA to always emerge victorious in confrontation with the enemies, thinking of a battle only awake or asleep.
					
					 He highly estimated the performance as a perfect one firm in the ideological stand as it fully represented the prevailing grave situation.
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Hyon Chol Hae and Pak Jong Chon.

articles.title: Letter from Bereaved Family of Ya. T. Nobichenko
articles.content:
Letter from Bereaved Family of Ya. T. Nobichenko
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the bereaved family of Ya. T. Nobichenko on March 9. Kim Jong Un sent a message of condolence to the family over the demise of Maria Ebmenovna Nobichenko, wife of Ya. T. Nobichenko, and showed warm benevolence for the family again.
					 Thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, Korean comrades have become closest friends in the funeral, the letter of thanks said.
					
					 We are very glad that the cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the letter noted.
					
					 It extended deep gratitude to Kim Jong Un for paying attention to the family affairs by dispatching staff members of the DPRK embassy and making the message of condolence over the death of Maria Ebmenovna Nobichenko officially handed over to the family despite so complicated situation of the DPRK.
					
					 The bereaved family members were greatly moved to hear the news that they would continue receiving supplementary living allowance, that had been sent by Kim Il Sung every year, thanks to Kim Jong Un though their father and mother passed away, the letter said.
					
					 It said that the family will forever cherish the brilliant memories of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It expressed the family's determination to work hard to uphold the spiritual legacies of Ya. T. Nobichenko and expectation that the Russia-DPRK friendship would be given steady continuity generation after generation.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and the DPRK prosperity.

articles.title: Army-People Rallies Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
articles.content:
Army-People Rallies Support Statement of KPA Supreme Command
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Army-people rallies were held in Kangwon and Ryanggang provinces and Rason City on Tuesday in support of the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Present there were officials of the local party, armed forces and power organs and working people's organizations, service persons of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms and teachers and students of universities and colleges.
					
					 The speakers at the rallies branded the U.S. imperialists as sworn enemy as they adopted an illegitimate UN "resolutions" on the just satellite launch of the DPRK and its third underground nuclear test and are bringing dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over this land.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The great brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu Kim Jong Un inspected the biggest hotspot, the areas where the flame of a decisive battle will first flare up, at a time when there created a touch-and-go situation. His matchless pluck and grit instill tremendous strength and encourage into all the service personnel and people.
					
					 The powerful revolutionary Paektusan army already took positions for a final attack for national reunification being equipped with all offensive means including sophisticated nuclear strike means. The army will make a merciless retaliatory strike at the invaders when an order is issued.
					
					 The speakers said that the army and people of the DPRK won the two revolutionary wars and always won victories as they are led by the great brilliant commanders. They will deal merciless strike at the group of invaders if they continue going reckless, and wrest an instrument of surrender from them without fail.

articles.title: DPRK Militiamen Ready for All-out Action
articles.content:
DPRK Militiamen Ready for All-out Action
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- In response to the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards are intensifying military trainings with a will to settle accounts with the U.S. imperialists and their followers.
					 Pak Kwang Song, an officer of the Central District, Pyongyang, Worker-Peasant Red Guards, told KCNA:
					
					 "The statement of the KPA Supreme Command spokesman declared invalid the Armistice Agreement, which represents the DPRK people's steadfast will to devotedly defend the nation's sovereignty.
					
					 It is reportedly said that the current military exercises Foal Eagle and Key Resolve involve a super-large nuclear-powered carrier task force, strategic bombers and other nuclear strike means of the U.S. forces.
					
					 But, we are never afraid of them. The DPRK will bring to naught all of them by dint of the Korean-style tactics and powerful strike means."
					
					 Another officer Hwang Yong Chol said:
					
					  "Present-day war knows no home front. It will be mistaken for the enemy to attempt creeping into our territory from the rear.
					
					 We, the members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards, will deal a deadly blow at the provokers if they dare to attack us."
					
					 Ri Sun Nam, a member of the guards, said:
					
					 "In the last Korean War (1950-1953), mercenaries of the 'UN Forces' could not escape from their tragic death by annihilating strikes of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Those countries, which joined the U.S. in staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle war exercises, are well advised to recall their troops from the exercises before too late, mindful of the past lesson.
					
					 Once respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un issues an order, we'll, together the KPA, inflict a shower of merciless fire on all the hostile forces."

articles.title: S. Korean Military Hooligans' Bluster Denounced by Pyongyang Citizen
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Hooligans' Bluster Denounced by Pyongyang Citizen
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The military hooligans of south Korea are preoccupied by making blusters, lost to shame, said Pyongyang citizen Ri Suk.
					 They shout hoarse that "north's regime will certainly be destroyed from the earth". The defense minister nominee also cried out for "bringing a regime change or toppling the regime in the north".
					
					 The colonial puppet forces are letting loose a string of invectives, while clinging to the coattail of their American master, being taken aback by the toughest countermeasures taken by the DPRK. This reminds one of a puppy unafraid of a tiger.
					
					 The puppet forces are being driven like a herd as bullet shields by the U.S. in the face of the all-out action for defending sovereignty and justice declared by the DPRK. They are decrying the inviolable social system in the DPRK, provoking laughters of the world people.
					
					 Unsightly in particular, is Kim Pyong Gwan who claims to have acquired "courage" to dedicate his life to the war though he had been intent on pocketing a nice sum from arms brokerage.
					
					  We hope to see his "courage" turn to action. He had better come out for action, not covering up his coward image with such lame excuses that he could not "punish" because of the U.S.
					
					 We will be happy to push him into a crucible as he follows the U.S. suit to perish in flame.

articles.title: DPRK Servicepersons Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Inspection
articles.content:
DPRK Servicepersons Inspired by Kim Jong Un's Inspection
Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on March 11 inspected the Wolnae Islet Defence Detachment, an outpost in the biggest hotspot in the western sector of the front.
					His inspection, which was conducted on a mortar boat despite possible provocation by the enemies, has touched heartstrings of all the servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK, inspiring them with confidence in final victory.
					
					Jong Hyok, a KPA officer, told KCNA:
					
					"During his inspection of the detachment, Marshal Kim Jong Un said that all the enemies quite often playing with fire in the sensitive hotspot should be thrown into a cauldron once he issues an order.
					
					We, artillerymen, will crush down the enemies' positions by powerful precision strikes the moment an order for action is given."
					
					Paek Min Chol, a KPA soldier, said:
					
					"We, servicepersons, feel courage and strength as Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un is always staying with us.
					
					Invincible is the Korean People's Army boasting of the harmonious whole of the Supreme Commander and his soldiers.
					
					As a soldier, I will dedicate my life to concluding a great war for national reunification to victory under the Supreme Commander's strategic plan."

articles.title: Tense Situation in Korean Peninsula Is Due to US Hostile Policy
articles.content:
Tense Situation in Korean Peninsula Is Due to US Hostile Policy
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- An acute situation is now prevailing in the Korean Peninsula due to the U.S. undisguised hostile policy towards the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. This is reminiscent of the crisis 20 years ago.
					 On March 12, Juche 82 (1993), the DPRK declared its withdrawal from the Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT) to defend its sovereignty, security and supreme interests from the increased U.S.-led imperialists' anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The DPRK's withdrawal from the treaty was not intended to get access to nukes, and it was a self-defensive step only to defend its right to existence by removing a pretext for military intervention on the part of the hostile forces.
					
					 The positive and constructive efforts, made by the DPRK to settle the nuclear issue even after the withdrawal, led to the adoption of the DPRK-U.S. Framework Agreement in October 1994.
					
					 However, the U.S. sought "collapse" of the DPRK behind the scene. The Obama administration, which emerged after the hawkish Bush administration, followed in the footsteps of the predecessors by sticking to the new line of "strategic patience" and thus augmented DPRK's repulsion and resistance.
					
					 The nuclear row, kicked up by the U.S., was focused on "collapse of socialism in the DPRK", not the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula. Such wild design of the U.S. could not be realized anyhow and its drag-on tactics only reinforced the DPRK's resentment as well as its retaliatory capabilities.
					
					 The last 20 years of the nuclear face-off between the DPRK and U.S., woven with the latter's ceaseless military pressure and economic sanctions on the former, resulted in the DPRK's access to nukes and long-range missiles after all.
					
					 The DPRK's satellite launch and possession of nukes are not designed to get an acknowledgement for a member of the "Space Club" and "Nuclear Club", as claimed by the West. They are only for ensuring smooth economic development and providing a guarantee for it.
					
					 Anti-DPRK pressures by application of double-standards, the unjust behaviors taken by the International Atomic Energy Agency and the like 20 years ago have been revived on an extension basis in the UN arena at present, and the U.S. launched the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for a nuclear war, together with its allied forces.
					
					 The reality goes to prove once again how timely and appropriate was the DPRK's choice of toughest counteraction.
					
					 The U.S. one-sided hostile policy derailed the DPRK from the track of nuclear development for peaceful purposes, forcing it to develop self-defensive nuclear deterrent.
					
					 Time will show with what additional retaliatory means the DPRK would drive the hostile forces into destruction.
					
					 The U.S. has no other choice but to give up its futile hostile policy towards the DPRK.

articles.title: Students' Defence Sports Games Held
articles.content:
Students' Defence Sports Games Held
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Defence sports games took place here on Sunday with those in their final year at secondary schools in the city involved.
					 The games showcased the students' strong will to devotedly fight a sacred war in defence of the country after joining the army as it was held at a time when the situation of the Korean Peninsula is going to the brink of war due to the Foal Eagle and Key Resolve joint military exercises kicked off by the U.S. and its allied forces to make a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The games started with Taekwon-Do event. The performers' movements gave a glimpse of their firm determination to stamp out at a stroke the U.S. imperialists and all other hostile forces infringing upon the nation's dignity and sovereignty.
					
					 Model satellites were launched one after another and effigies of the U.S. troops were burnt in flame.
					
					 The games ended with group forced march and tug-of-war events displaying the mental power and unity of the collective.
					
					 Those students from Central District came first in the games.

articles.title: DPRK Shooting Players Prove Successful at Int'l Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Shooting Players Prove Successful at Int'l Tournament
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- DPRK shooting players Pak Yong Hui and Yang Sol I respectively won a silver medal and a bronze medal at the women's individual skeet shooting event of the Second International Shooting Tournament for Grand Prix named after the emir of Kuwait.
					 The tournament brought together more than 430 ace players from the DPRK and 39 countries and regions.
					
					 The DPRK players came back home on Mar. 12.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Protecting Wild Animals
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Big Efforts to Protecting Wild Animals
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- March to July are set as months for protecting wild animals in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The law on protection of wild animals was adopted in the country in November Juche 87 (1998). Since then, the government has paid deep attention to the work.
					
					 The C.C., Nature Conservation Union of Korea and other related institutions have energetically conducted activities to inform the inhabitants of the necessities and ways for protecting and propagating wild animals.
					
					 The number of sanctuaries for animals and birds has considerably increased across the country.
					
					 Meanwhile, a campaign to create meadows in hills and mountains was launched on a nationwide scale in this tree-planting season.
					
					 Forests surrounding primary and secondary schools in rural areas have become home to species of birds.
					
					 Particular attention is paid to preserving the species of endangered or rare animals.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Guidance for Development of DPRK's Circus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Guidance for Development of DPRK's Circus
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The "Trapeze Flight on Horizontal Bar" and "Rope Etude", performed by acrobats of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, won silver and special prizes at the 37th Monte Carlo International Acrobatic Festival in January.
					 All of those performers are graduates of the Pyongyang Acrobatic School.
					
					 The credit for their signal successes goes to the meticulous care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On March 12, Juche 65 (1976), Kim Jong Il visited the Pyongyang Circus to guide a acrobatic performance of the school's first-term graduates.
					
					 Giving a high appreciation of their performance, he underscored the need to pay big efforts to training reserves in a far-sighted manner. And he posed for a picture with them, at their request.
					
					 The photo, taken on the day, has become one of reminders in the history of the school.
					
					 Under his deep care, the graduates developed to be talented acrobats and the DPRK's circus rose to fame worldwide through many feats such as "Aerial Flight on Trapeze", "Flying Girls" and "Seesaw".

articles.title: No Force on Earth Can Match DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
No Force on Earth Can Match DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- No force on earth can match the army and people of the DPRK all out in defending its sovereignty, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article.
					 Sovereignty can be guaranteed only by powerful strength in the stand-off between the DPRK and the U.S., the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Our powerful strength is justice which is sure to win.
					
					 The DPRK is countering the nuclear threat from the U.S., which has adopted a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK as a policy, with more powerful precision nuclear strike means of Korean style.
					
					 Our nuclear deterrent is a reliable weapon for defending the sovereignty.
					
					 The third underground nuclear test proved the tremendous might of our nuclear deterrent greatly conducive to defending the sovereignty and security of the country and ensuring peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia from the aggressive challenges of the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 The U.S., though belatedly, should face up to the reality, stop at once the aggressive and adventurous nuclear war maneuvers, immediately apologize for getting the UN Security Council to authorize another "resolution on sanctions" which wantonly encroached upon the sovereignty of the DPRK, and recognize its right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					
					 It should, in particular, correct its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. intends to continue making the DPRK a victim to its aggressive and hegemonic foreign policy, not rolling back its hostile policy toward the DPRK, it will accelerate its self-ruin.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Officer's Extremely Provocative Remarks Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Officer's Extremely Provocative Remarks Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Pyong Gwan, puppet defense minister hopeful of south Korea, recently hurled abuses at the DPRK over the important measures taken by it to cope with the hostile forces' racket of escalating confrontation against it.
					 He cried out for "getting a regime change in the north or bringing it down."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in a bylined commentary observes this Tuesday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 His remarks are an extremely vicious challenge to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and unpardonable political and military provocations.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces which have further escalated the tensions and created a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 There is a limit to our patience.
					
					 Time has come to go into action against those puppet forces engrossed only in provocations and vicious practices, not just making words.
					
					 The top officers of the south Korean puppet military are exactly the first target of the great war for national reunification as they are running amuck to ignite a war, ignorant of the north-south relations and what the real war is like.
					
					 Kim Pyong Gwan and other military hooligans will be made to keenly realize the price they will have to pay for their criminal actions of dare making invectives against the DPRK.

articles.title: Japanese FM Accused of Undermining Spirit of Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Japanese FM Accused of Undermining Spirit of Pyongyang Declaration
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese foreign minister said that Japan would make every possible effort to settle the abduction issue from the stand that there can be no normalization of diplomatic relations without settling the abduction issue. He also pledged to "promote the package settlement of all pending issues including abduction, nuke and missile issues based on Japan-DPRK Pyongyang Declaration".
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nonsensical sophism which can be made only by those seized with the hostile policy toward the DPRK, unaware of the basic spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration.
					
					 The Pyongyang declaration calls upon Japan to liquidate the inglorious past and realize diplomatic relations with the DPRK.
					
					 The declaration has not yet been implemented. It is attributable to Japan keen on the moves against the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Japan is now pushing the DPRK-Japan relations to an extreme phase pursuant to the hostile policy toward the DPRK in line with the U.S. moves for stifling it, contrary to the spirit of the declaration.
					
					 If the Japanese authorities respect the declaration, they should stop all the hostile acts against the DPRK, to say nothing of economic pressure and blockade against it.
					
					 Japan's violation of the declaration is evidenced by the fact that it is evading the past liquidation, the core for settling the issue of the bilateral relations.
					
					 The Japanese authorities speak loudly of implementing the declaration but they are working hard to shift the blame for non-compliance with it on to the DPRK. They can never evade their duty on redressing the past crimes from the international legal point of view.
					
					 What is basic in settling the issue of DPRK-Japan relations is Japan's liquidation of the past crimes.
					
					 The Japanese authorities had better clearly bear this in mind and do what it should do.

articles.title: Minju Joson Assails Japan's Move to Grab Tok Islets
articles.content:
Minju Joson Assails Japan's Move to Grab Tok Islets
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Japanese foreign minister Kishida again claimed Japan's "dominium over Tok Islets".
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a bylined commentary denounces this as a wanton violation of the Korean nation's sovereignty and an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 From the ancient times, Tok Islets have been part of an inalienable territory of Korea, as confirmed by lots of historical facts based on geographical and legal reasons. This admits of no argument.
					
					 Nevertheless, the Japanese foreign minister brazen-facedly claimed "dominium over Tok Islets", making the "issue of Tok Islets" a subject of debate and calling for "settling" it.
					
					 This is nothing but a gangster-like act of claiming other's thing as his own.
					
					 The Japanese foreign minister's outbursts about Tok Islets made in succession from the last year to this year can not be merely viewed as personal remarks. What matters is that Japan's move to seize the islets has become evermore undisguised and realistic.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are fanning up a hot-wind of militarism throughout the society of Japan more zealously than any time before, getting frantic in their move to grab Tok Islets. Lurking behind this is their sinister scheme to make the islets an excuse and a springboard for reinvasion.
					
					 But their ambition to seize the islets is a wild dream that can never come true.
					
					 Should they set their black feet of invasion even an inch on the territory of Korea, bereft of reason, the army and people of the DPRK will give full vent to their pent-up grudge and wipe them out to the last man.

articles.title: S. Korea Slammed for Hurling Reserve Forces to War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korea Slammed for Hurling Reserve Forces to War Drills
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers started training reserve forces across south Korea on March 4, timed to coincide with the madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises for invading the north, south Korean KBS reported on March 11. The on-going military drills that will last till November are said to mobilize a total of more than 3.6 millions.
					 During the period the warmongers seek to further intensify mental education against the DPRK, special warfare training and snipers training.
					
					 Mobile drills to actually deploy commanding groups in the forefront will be staged in the period.
					
					 Meanwhile, the warmongers plan to allot a fabulous amount of money to turning battalion-level training ground for reserve forces into a regiment-level one from this year to 2020 and, to begin with, set up training grounds in Seoul, Kwangju, Taegu, Taejon, Pusan and other cities.
					
					 The largest-ever drills of reserve forces prove that the warmongers are spurring the preparations for invading the north.

articles.title: Forest Fire Causes Casualties in S. Korea
articles.content:
Forest Fire Causes Casualties in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Wildfire broke out in Phohang and Ulsan, North Kyongsang Province and different other areas of south Korea, south Korean MBC reported on March 10.
					 It was reported that dozens of dwelling houses were burnt down, leaving casualties.

articles.title: Halt to North-targeted War Maneuvers Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to North-targeted War Maneuvers Demanded
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Members of Hanyang University belonging to the Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement denouncing the U.S. and the puppet group for their war maneuvers against the north.
					 Key Resolve is large-scale war maneuvers with nuclear carrier, Stealth fighters and strategic bombers involved, the statement said.
					
					 Such war exercises and the "sanctions" racket against the north are pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war, it noted.
					
					 It demanded a halt to the north-targeted military drills and "sanctions" racket, saying it is just like pouring fuel on the burning house.

articles.title: Sit-in Strikers Protest War Maneuvers in S. Korea
articles.content:
Sit-in Strikers Protest War Maneuvers in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Joint Action for Peace against War of south Korea is staging a sit-in strike every day amid the support of people from all walks of life in protest against the north-targeted war maneuvers by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet warmongers. The sit-in strike started on March 5.
					 The organization staged a sit-in strike in Seoul on March 9, too.
					
					 Joining the action were members of the Unified Progressive Party, the opposition party.
					
					 The strikers said sovereignty is most important for them and to defend it is more precious than their lives.
					
					 They called for further expanding the struggle for peace against war today when the danger of war is increasing than ever before.
					
					 They stressed that the struggle for preventing a war and defending peace is sure to win.

articles.title: S. Korean Radio Lambastes US, S. Kore for Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Radio Lambastes US, S. Kore for Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, south Korean internet radio, on March 7 released a commentary as regards the serious situation caused by the "sanctions" racket against the DPRK kicked off by the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean warmongers.
					 The commentary deplored the situation now inching close to the worst crisis ever since the June 25 war.
					
					 The development is mainly attributable to the UN Security Council's fabrication of a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK, it noted, adding: This is ineffective and very unreasonable.
					
					 It is the height of double standards that those countries which conducted many nuclear tests and launched many satellites call into question the north only over its satellite launch, the commentary charged.
					
					 The U.S. should not repeat the failed policy of "strategic patience" that was geared to apply "sanctions" and put pressure on the north, it stressed.

articles.title: Guarantee of S. Korean Women's Rights Called for
articles.content:
Guarantee of S. Korean Women's Rights Called for
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Women's organizations in Kwangju, south Korea, including the Kwangju Women's Sisterhood Society and the Kwangju-South Jolla Federation of Women's Organizations, held a press conference outside the Kwangju City Office on March 7 at which they called for ensuring the rights of women.
					 Discrimination and violence practiced against women are getting serious day by day and their vital rights are ruthlessly trampled down, the organizations deplored.
					
					 They demanded the authorities take measures to improve the women's situation.
					
					 They said they would struggle to realize the rights of women such as the offer of the same wages as men, intensification of punishment on sexual criminals, guarantee of vital rights for the disabled women and provision of the system for supporting upbringing.

articles.title: Military Threat, Blackmail Will Not Work on DPRK: Chongryon
articles.content:
Military Threat, Blackmail Will Not Work on DPRK: Chongryon
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- Officials of the organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on March 11 as regards the nuclear war racket of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers that has reached an extreme phase.
					 Ri Jong Man, managing director of the Standing Council of the Korean Federation of Workers in Commerce in Japan, said any military threat and blackmail will not work on the Korean people who have defended the sovereignty of the country standing against the U.S. imperialists for over half a century. He urged the U.S. and its followers to stop at once the reckless and foolish moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, noted the struggle of the people in the homeland to put an end to the moves of the hostile forces for isolating and stifling the DPRK is sure to win.
					
					  Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, condemned the U.S. as the thrice-cursed sworn enemy of the Korean nation, saying that no force on earth can match the Korean people and the DPRK, which are full of conviction of victory, and single-mindedly united around their leader.
					
					 Ho Yong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, expressed the will to always go about their patriotic work to usher in a new heyday of Chongryon full of the conviction that a final victory is in store for the DPRK in the all-out action to defend its sovereignty.
					
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is attributable to the U.S. and its followers.
					
					 Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, underscored the need to dynamically turn out in the struggle for frustrating the reckless nuclear war maneuvers of the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers.

articles.title: Halt to North-targeted War Maneuvers Demanded
articles.content:
Halt to North-targeted War Maneuvers Demanded
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany made public a joint statement on March 6 demanding the United States stop at once the north-targeted war racket.
					 The statement bitterly condemned in the name of the fellow countrymen the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises which the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers stage every year under the pretext of "annual and defensive ones".
					
					 The U.S. should know that the statement issued by a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army on March 5 will never be an empty word but a final decision and determination of the DPRK which it restrained for 60 years, the statement stressed.
					
					  All the fellow countrymen in the north and the south and abroad are always remembering the horrible crimes committed by the U.S. in the Korean war, and the world has clearly seen for whom and for what the U.S. fights a war through its war of aggression against Iraq, it noted.
					
					 It branded the U.S. as the root cause and chief culprit of all evils.
					
					 The U.S. must be well aware of the fate it will face in case the joint military exercises spill over into an irrevocable war, the statement said.

articles.title: US Criminal Propensity Justifies North Korea's Nukes
articles.content:
US Criminal Propensity Justifies North Korea's Nukes
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The M 4, a website of China, on March 10 carried an article titled "U.S. criminal propensity justifies north Korea's nukes".
					 The article said:
					
					  No other state on earth has endured a trade embargo or a gamut of diplomatic, financial and economic sanctions more than north Korea.  For more than 63 years since the beginning of the Korean War (1950-1953), the DPRK has been frozen out of normal relations with other international states because of a trade embargo imposed by Washington. 
					
					 This illegal straightjacket has been tightened several times down through the decades with resolutions and sanctions implemented by the UN Security Council-the latest being instigated last Friday.
					
					The latest round of sanctions at the U.N., initiated once again by the U.S., aims to make all remaining international conduct by north Korea next to impossible. As well as complete blackout of financial transactions, north Korea's shipping and air transport are to be impounded if they do not comply with unilateral inspections at any point.
					
					 All threats of nuclear extinction made against north Korea have come from one source-the United States of America. 
					
					 Yet in the Orwellian world of Western governments and their dutiful news media, reality is turned upside down. Selective amnesia and selective reporting convey the public image that it is north Korea who is the aggressor and insane nuclear threat while the U.S. is the voice of reason, peace and legality.
					
					 One would never guess the true nature of the conflict on the Korean Peninsula and its very real threat to global security from a reading of the Western mainstream media. All history of the Korean conflict has been whitewashed of salient facts.
					
					 Take just the recent history over the last months. The latest sanctions imposed on north Korea are said to be in response to the DPRK's underground nuclear bomb test on Feb. 12. But that test was carried out after the country was threatened with sanctions in January following its successful launch of a satellite into outer space in December.
					
					 What we have here is a long cycle of U.S.-led provocation and north Korean counter-provocation. But the dynamic is only ever presented as an irrational series of provocations by Pyongyang.
					
					 And let's remember that north Korea only embarked on its nuclear program following earlier threats of nuclear devastation by the U.S. in 1993, after which the DPRK gave notice that it was quitting the Non-Proliferation Treaty. Nuclear weapons were first introduced into the Peninsula by the Americans in 1950s.
					
					 The Peninsula was partitioned at the behest of the U.S. In the newly created south Korea, the U.S. went about installing remnants of the pro-Japanese puppets and quislings.
					
					 When the war broke out between north and south, the U.S. mobilized its military including nuclear weapons in support of the south. 
					
					It is estimated that many innocent people were killed by U.S. air force bombers. Every city and major town in the north was completely destroyed.
					
					 Since then, the Korean War has never ended technically. The people of north Korea have lived under the shadow of destruction from American nuclear bombs.
					
					 Given the economic, political and military stranglehold that Washington maintains on north Korea it is hardly surprising that the latter has remained fiery in its Songun politics.
					
					 North Korea's insistence on having nuclear weapons and the right to use them is based on rational and even sound moral judgment.
					
					 With an objective understanding of history, it is the United States which is seen to be rogue state that is a threat to global security.
					
					 North Korea's nuclear weapons are probably the only thing restraining Washington in its criminal propensity to gratuitously attack other nations. 
					
					 In that way, ironically, north Korea and its nuclear defenses have managed to sustain peace in East Asia in the face of relentless U.S. aggression.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Cambodian Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Cambodian Newspaper
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was carried by the Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon on March 6.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), indicates tasks to be fulfilled to firmly preserve and glorify forever the idea and revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Courage and Grit Praised by British Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Courage and Grit Praised by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Mar. 4 to mark the 1st anniversary of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's inspection of Panmunjom.
					 His inspection of Panmunjom last year was a historical event that showed his courage and grit as a great brilliant Songun commander, the statement said.
					
					 He has successfully carried forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He made an inspection of Panmunjom, symbol of Korean division, defying the provocations by the arrogant U.S. imperialists and hangdog south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 There he revealed his firm will to achieve the national reunification at the earliest date.
					
					 He also encouraged all Koreans in their struggle for the national reunification, greatest national desire.
					
					 The Korean people will surely reunify their country under his leadership.

articles.title: Pakistani Organization Extends Solidarity to Koreans
articles.content:
Pakistani Organization Extends Solidarity to Koreans
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association issued an appeal to foreign organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people on Mar. 5 to mark the 60th anniversary of their victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 The appeal said the historic victory of the Korean people was attributable to the outstanding leadership art and Juche-oriented war method of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 On July 27 this year the Koreans are to mark the 60th anniversary of their great victory in the war, day of second liberation of Korea, as they defeated the imperialists' invasion and honorably defended the country's sovereignty and national dignity, the appeal noted, and went on:
					
					 The great significance of July 27 lies in that Koreans safeguarded the independence of the country by fighting a war unprecedented in history.
					
					 We call upon the organizations for friendship and solidarity with Koreans to form preparatory committees for grandly celebrating the day and send full support to the Koreans in their struggle for the national reunification under the banner of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					  Let us take part in the grand peace march from Pyongyang to Panmunjom to build up the public opinion for the replacement of the Korean Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty in order to avert a war and ensure durable peace, and organize diverse celebrations on the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					  Let us extend full solidarity to the Koreans' struggle for defending socialism and achieving independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
US-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 12 (KCNA) -- The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association sent a letter to the U.S. and the south Korean chief executives on Mar. 4 in protest against the aggressive and provocative Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 Strongly denouncing the U.S. Administration and the south Korean authorities for their above-said joint military drills, the letter said:
					
					 The drills aimed to invade the DPRK after mounting a preemptive attack on it are a grave threat and blackmail against the DPRK, not ones for defence in their scale and nature.
					
					 The U.S. has no right and reason to meddle in the issue of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. troops in south Korea are a product of policy of aggression and colonialism.
					
					 We urge the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the above-said exercises.
					
					 The U.S. forces should be withdrawn from south Korea at an early date and the south Korean authorities put an end to their acts of sycophancy and treachery.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Wolnae
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Wolnae
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el dia 11 la unidad de defensa de la isla Wolnae, base avanzada en la zona mas candente del frente oeste cerca de la enemiga isla Paekryong.
					El Mariscal abrazo uno tras uno a los ninos de la unidad de defensa, quienes tomaban manos de sus madres, y se fotografio junto con ellos.
					
					Caminando durante largo tiempo por la senda de la unidad de defensa, se entero detalladamente de la topografia y objetos terrestres de la isla, el estado de ubicacion de las armas de fuego y la vida de los militares.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, recibio el parte del jefe de la unidad sobre la situacion de los enemigos.
					
					Al hacer conocimiento detallado de la disposicion de la brigada de marina no.6 del ejercito titere y los blancos en la isla Paekryong, evaluo que la unidad esta plenamente dispuesta para hacer frente a las provocaciones de los enemigos.
					
					Ordeno elevar mas en el futuro la densidad de fuego y completar de continuo el proyecto sobre el encargo del deber de fuego y el uso de canones conforme al estado de los enemigos en cambio.
					
					Definio detalladamente a los comandantes de la unidad de defensa de la isla y los miembros de mando de artilleria del cuerpo no.4 del EPC el orden de ataque y la densidad de fuego para aniquilar los blancos enemigos incluyendo los puestos de radar, los radiodetectores de canones, la base de lanzamiento Harpoon y las companias de los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de 130mm y los canones automotor de tiro parabolico de 155mm.
					
					Firmo la nueva norma de operacion maritima para hacer el imperioso tiro de advertencia cuando los buques de guerra de los enemigos acercan a la zona maritima de la linea de demarcacion militar y para hacer el fuerte fuego a punteria directa cuando ellos la invaden.
					
					Senalo que su inspeccion a las unidades de defensa de las islas radicadas en la zona mas candente del frente suroeste es para enterarse correctamente de los preparativos de combate y definir finalmente el orden de ataque a precision a los blancos.
					
					Subrayo que ahora los enemigos estan impacientes por los proyectiles del EPC y agrego que ellos mismos agravan la situacion practicando los ejercicios anuales en la zona mas aguda por la confrontacion entre ambas partes, pero estan tan inquietados. 
					
					Destaco que si les ordena a los militares deben aniquilar a los enemigos que libran los ejercicios belicosos en esta zona muy cadente.
					
					Senalo que en realidad, es muy alta la densidad de fuego del EPC y puede atacar 3 o 4 veces a los blancos enemigos de la isla Paekryong y convertirla en el mar de fuego.
					
					Dijo que en los dias del combate, el jefe de la unidad de defensa tirara por si mismo la foto del campo enemigo convertido en el mar de fuego y la enviara a la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					Enfatizo que si se de la orden, deben demostrar a los enemigos cual es la verdadera guerra del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu acabando con la vida de los enemigos.
					
					Como encomendo durante la inspeccion a la unidad de defensa de la isla Jangjae y la unidad heroina de defensa de la isla Mu, los artilleros de la unidad de defensa de la isla Wolnae deben lanzar el primer canonazo y el cartucho de senales de la gran batalla por la reunificacion de la patria si se de la orden del Comandante Supremo, destaco.
					
					Senalando que la unidad acondiciono bien los puestos de combate incluyendo el puesto de vigilancia conforme al proposito de la Comandancia Suprema de hacer todos los preparativos para el enfrentamiento total, se mostro muy satisfecho de que esta es la unidad magnifica convertida en la base de ataque.
					
					Con la orden del Comandante Supremo otorgo directamente en el mismo lugar el titulo militar de cargo inmediatamente superior al jefe y el instructor politico de la unidad de defensa quienes convirtieron la unidad en la fortaleza inexpugnable y el buque insumergible.
					
					El Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto con el soldado Kim Kwang Chol quien cumplia la guardia de vigilancia y los comandantes de la unidad.
					
					Recorriendo el cuartel y la sala de educacion atendio la vida de los militares.
					
					Dio a la unidad como recuerdos binoculos y fusil automatico y se fotografio junto con los militares y las familias de los oficiales.
					
					Ese dia, presencio la funcion artistica de los militares de la unidad.
					
					Senalando que los militares hicieron bien la funcion y esto es el ejemplo de la cultura del Songun y evaluo que la unidad hace bien la labor de educacion politica e ideologica conforme al proposito del partido.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il y An Ji Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona subunidad artillera de largo alcance de unidad 641 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona subunidad artillera de largo alcance de unidad 641 del EPC
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono el dia 11 una subunidad de artilleria de largo alcance de la unidad 641 del EPC que tiene la mision de atacar y aniquilar a los enemigos de la isla Paekryong.
					Expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares de la subunidad apoyaran fielmente la direccion del partido sobre la revolucion del Songun, les dio como recuerdo binoculos y fusil automatico y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					El Comandante Supremo recibio de los comandantes el parte detallado del estado de preparacion al combate de la subunidad.
					
					Evaluo altamente el hecho de que la unidad esta preparada perfectamente para el combate y espera la orden de fuego apuntando sin excepcion alguna los blancos enemigos a atacar, acorde al intento operacional y tactico de la Comandancia Suprema.
					
					Luego de ver los canones de marca Juche emplazados en la subunidad, le asigno la mision de aniquilar el cuartel general de la brigada de marina no.6 del ejercito titere surcoreano y los batallones adscritos si los enemigos en la isla Paekryong dan algun movimiento sospechoso.
					
					Dirigiendo los ejercicios de manejo de canones de los militares de la subunidad, midio el tiempo de preparacion para el tiro.
					
					Luego, elogio a los artilleros por que se hayan preparado para lanzar obuses ahora mismo si es necesario.
					
					La guerra moderna es el combate de canones y la preparacion al combate de artilleros es la de todo el EPC, senalo y presento las tareas que serviran de guia en perfeccionar la preparacion de la subunidad.
					
					Subrayando que cada dia de ahora se vive en el estado de guerra de verdad, agrego que es una tarea de combate de impostergable cumplimiento que los artilleros se hagan buenos tiradores.
					
					Conforme al mejoramiento de armamentos de la unidad y al cambio del intento operacional de los enemigos, hay que buscar constantemente nuevos metodos de artilleria al estilo coreano, organizar y dirigir bien las operaciones de combate artillero y poner al maximo el poder de canones.
					
					Concedo mucha importancia a esta unidad de artilleria, senalo y ordeno que castigue con el fuego de justicia de inimaginable poder si los enemigos actuan imprudentemente para que los agresores no puedan estar a salvo.
					
					Recorriendo la sala de educacion y el dormitorio de una compania subordinada a la subunidad, el Mariscal presto profunda atencion a las condiciones de vida de los militares.
					
					Volvio a expresar gran satisfaccion de que los oficiales y soldados de las unidades radicadas en el frente occidental hayan convertido todas las zonas operacionales en fortalezas inexpugnables para defender a costa de la vida el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Debido a las imprudentes provocaciones de los enemigos, el frente occidental devino la zona mas candente donde se puede desatar la guerra ahora mismo, apunto.
					
					Dada la situacion a punto de explosion, es preciso mantenerse en el estado de maxima alerta, dijo e instruyo abrir un poderoso fuego de venganza sobre los enemigos si estos se atreven a invadir, aunque fuera 0.001㎜, las zonas maritimas bajo la soberania de la RPDC. 
					
					Le acompanaron en esta inspeccion Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il y An Ji Yong.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Criadero de Peces de Ryongjong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Criadero de Peces de Ryongjong
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un dirigio en el terreno el Criadero de Peces de Ryongjong.
					Lo califico de ejemplar y representativo de la epoca del Songun que fue acondicionado por la iniciativa y la energica guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Diciendo que no puede olvidar el 21 de noviembre de 2010 en que visito este lugar acompanando al Dirigente, recordo los inmensos y abnegados esfuerzos de el quien recorrio largo y arduo camino para registrar nuevo viraje en la piscicultura conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo.
					
					En la sala de mando general, el Mariscal observo como miden en tiempo real con ordenadores el caudal, la temperatura, PH y la cantidad de oxigeno de las lagunas de cria de peces bajo techo y al aire libre y como vigilan con la camara submarina el estado fisiologico de peces.
					
					La cuestion importante de la cria de peces es asentarla sobre la base cientifica, dijo agregando que asi se puede normalizar la produccion en alto nivel.
					
					Recorrio las lagunas de cria acondicionadas a lo largo de la corriente derivada de la fuente de Ryongjong.
					
					Vio muy satisfecho los esturiones y varios peces coleteando en las lagunas.
					
					Al ver el agua manantial de la fuente de Ryongjong, recordo que cuando se vio bloqueada esa corriente, los militares y los empleados del criadero la recuperaron mediante una campana intensa y destaco que es muy importante suministrar el agua en la cria de peces.
					
					Viendo la fabrica de cebo y la de pienso proteinico, construidas en los alrededores de las lagunas al aire libre, dijo que ellas fueron visitadas por el Dirigente.
					
					Si no logra asegurar el cebo, no se puede obtener beneficios reales por muy moderno que fuera el criadero, acoto.
					
					Mirando el letrero "!Los esturiones hacia el mar, Corea hacia el mundo!" colocado en el recinto de criadero, senalo que bajo la sabia direccion del partido, se crean en todos los lugares del pais los milagros sorprendentes en medio de la campana para conquistar las tecnologias de punta.
					
					Anadio que hace falta agregar la frase "!El satelite artificial hacia el cosmos!"
					
					Enseno que el criadero es un fruto de amor al pueblo del Dirigente y enfatizo que se debe construir en el recinto del criadero el monumento a las inmortales hazanas de guia del Dirigente y su imagen y transmitirlas de generacion en generacion.
					
					Subrayo que los funcionarios y empleados deben desempenar el papel de vanguardia en hacer realidad el deseo del Dirigente de alimentar muchos pescados a los habitantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta visita Choe Ryong Hae, Kim Kyok Sik, Kim Yong Chol, Pak Jong Chon, Rim Kwang Il y An Ji Yong.

articles.title: Responsabilidad de consecuencia catastrofica recae sobre EE.UU. y Sur de Corea, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
Responsabilidad de consecuencia catastrofica recae sobre EE.UU. y Sur de Corea, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 11 una declaracion como sigue:
					A contrapelo de las repetidas advertencias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y fuertes rechazos internos y exteriores, Estados Unidos y los belicistas surcoreanos iniciaron por fin los provocativos ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve".
					
					En estos ejercicios que se libran freneticamente en el cielo, tierra y mar del Sur de Corea junto con el simulacro "Foal Eagle" iniciados el pasado dia primero participan los efectivos norteamericanos, del ejercito titere surcoreano y otras fuerzas de los Estados satelites incluyendo Gran Bretana y Australia, la flota de portaaviones nuclear de EE.UU., los bombarderos estrategicos "B-52", los cazabombarderos tipo Stealth "F-22", el destructor Aegis y otros medios de ataque nuclear de tierra, aerea y mar dotados de bombas nucleares y obuses.
					
					Coincidiendo con los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC de gran envergadura, las autoridades titeres y los gangsteres del circulo militar del Sur de Corea lanzan abiertamente los disparates del llamado "ataque a las fuerzas de mando" y el "foco original" y la "extincion del poder del Norte".
					
					Estos ejercicios que se libran de modo tridimensional con la participacion de los medios de ataque nuclear de gran envergadura y las fuerzas de los Estados satelites son los juegos de guerra nuclear mas peligrosa y las acciones provocativas mas abiertas sin precedentes al juzgar su caracter,  tamano y contenido.
					
					A pesar de esto, los belicistas norteamericanos y los titeres surcoreanos los describen como "ejercicios anuales de defensa" para impedir la "provocacion y la amenaza del Norte".
					
					Al ubicar durante decenas anos los equipos de guerra nuclear en el suelo surcoreanos libran los ejercicios de guerra agresiva y hablan de los "ejercicios anuales de defensa", lo cual es el apogeo de desverguenza.
					
					?Como pueden ser los "ejercicios anuales  de defensa", el simulacro de guerra nuclear de gran envergadura para el ataque preventivo a la Direccion y los puntos estrategicos y el "derrumbe del poder de su contraparte?
					
					Es la clara declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC el que EE.UU. y los belicistas surcoreanos ponen en practica los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve".
					
					Ya declaramos que a partir del dia 11 de marzo en que los ejercicios de guerra nuclear anti-RPDC pasan a la etapa decisiva se invalidaria el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea, se anularian totalmente todos los acuerdos de no agresion aprobados entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea y tomaria consecutivamente la segunda y tercera contramedida mas fuerte y real.
					
					Debido a que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos desafian al ultimatum de la RPDC con las imprudentes maquinaciones de guerra, el Acuerdo de Armisticio y los acuerdos de no agresion, aparatos de detencion de guerra, se anularon totalmente y la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana sin mecanismo de freno capaz de detener la guerra corre al borde del estallido de la guerra.
					
					La grave situacion de hoy muestra claramente que EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos cuestionaron obstinadamente el legal lanzamiento del satelite con fines pacificos y la justa prueba nuclear de autodefensa de la RPDC y agravaron de modo escalonado la situacion con el objetivo desatar la guerra nuclear anti-RPDC, y ellos son autores del estallido de la guerra y destructores de la paz de la Peninsula Corea.
					
					Dado que los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos encendieron el fuego de agresion anti-RPDC es clara la opcion de esta.
					
					Responder al cuchillo con espada, al fusil con el canon y a las armas nucleares con los medios de ataque nuclear a precision al estilo coreano mas poderosos es la posicion y la respuesta invariable del ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Ahora, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC estan llenos de la voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos.
					
					Como ya declaramos, todos los medios de ataque incluyendo todo el ejercito y el pueblo y los sofisticados medios de ataque nuclear ocuparon sus posiciones para el combate de ataque final por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Si disparamos todos se convertiran en el mar de fuego.
					
					Si EE.UU. y la banda titere  surcoreano lanzan una bala en la sagrada tierra, mar y cielo de la RPDC, el ejercito y el pueblo de esta exterminaran implacablemente los bastiones y las bases de la agresion y lograran la reunificacion de la patria, anhelo de la nacion coreana, no perdiendo jamas tal oportunidad.
					
					No se puede tolerar mas el mundo ilegal en que reinan la arbitrariedad y brutalidad de EE.UU.
					
					La RPDC castigara rotundamente con los fusiles de justicia a los provocadores y agresores que se entregan a las maniobras de injusticia de toda indole.
					
					La responsabilidad de la consecuencia catastrofica que se emanen desde ahora recaera enteramente sobre EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana, que son provocadores.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia ambicion de Japon de usurpar islote Tok
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia ambicion de Japon de usurpar islote Tok
Pyongyang, 12 de marzo (ACNC) -- Hace poco, el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de Japon, Kishida, reclamo otra vez el "derecho de posesion del islote Tok", lo cual significa atentado flagrante contra la soberania de la nacion coreana y una provocacion politica nunca perdonable.
					Asi subraya el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 12 y continua:
					
					Desde la antiguedad, el islote Tok es territorio legitimo de Corea y esto ha sido comprobado de modo irrefutable con hechos historicos y argumentos geograficos y legales.
					
					Sin embargo, el canciller japones se atrevio a demandar la "solucion del problema del islote Tok", insistiendo en que esta tierra ajena es la japonesa.
					
					Tal opinion absurda, que se escucha este ano tambien, no es un dicho individual y deja conocer que se ponen en practica de manera cada vez mas abierta las tentativas de reaccionarios japoneses para arrebatar el islote.
					
					Ahora, ellos levantan mas que nunca en la sociedad japonesa la ola de militarismo y tratan de retomar el camino de agresion comenzando por arrebatar el Tok.
					
					Pero, esta ambicion es irrealizable.
					
					Si ellos emprenden la agresion contra Corea, el ejercito y pueblo coreanos los exterminaran explotando su acumulada indignacion.
